code: import rootReducer from"./store/reducers/rootReducer";import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import{persistStore}from"redux-persist";var reduxConfig=function reduxConfig(){var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(thunk));var persistor=persistStore(store);return{store:store,persistor:persistor};};export default reduxConfig;
